title: so Sejuani's boar, Bristle is just a mount now?
body:
correct me if im wrong but the new sejuani besides her q bristle is just a mount that doesnt attack now?

old sejuani during her w he would replace her autos during the flail but now since the flail spin is gone im assuming he doesnt do anything besides carry her and charge with q

most cases i would be fine but it seems like a bit of a waste considering this isnt just a regular mount like a horse or even skarl (one not capable of usefull combat and another being a coward) but this is a gigantic boar

like LOOK AT THIS THING

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9SLg8_5_LZY/WQJB_ADDaOI/AAAAAAABDJA/0xIsFjMoz3UYwxG869rOnQjdcpz6HLZhQCLcB/s640/Sejuani_Splash_3.jpg

its so big and ugly and adorable 

but it can only walk around and sometimes headbutt charge 

im alright with it but its a bit odd 

thoughts?

replies.body:
I am disappointed in Riot. They didn't even listen to the best idea for a Sejuani rework. Poor Bristle.

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/ca557c04c5ac9d2399a70028f35eef0b.jpg
Is that the new Boar on a Whore skin I've been hearing so much about?
i dont think you're allowed to post that

it'd be hard to get an animal to fight back unless under attack. if the animal is disciplined and trusts the rider it would walk through fire without so much as a whimper. bristle might strike out when sejuani criticals. if your mount is flailing all over the place and you're trying to swing a flail on top of the beast you're more likely to hurt yourself rather than hurt your enemies. so it does make sense to a degree. in all honesty though the fact that an unarmored woman using a flail on the back of a wooly boar in the middle of a frozen tundra is just a bit crazy to begin with.

you made some really good points and i appreciate your comment 

but i find it hard to believe that a leader such as Sejuani who is warhardened and is used to the cold and has a boar who is JUST as war hardened to not have that companion sync/trust 

plus sejuani has more muscle than me and you combined so im sure she can control the flail 

sejuani/Bristle are both used to eachother's attacks so they can coordinate their own without mistakes

i've always seen them as one so its a bit sad that he is just gonna be a intimidating boar just for visuals. all bark no bite

i had a pretty long typed up thing, but my firefox crashed so i'll just list the main points.

think of bristle as a knight with a shield defending his queen.
having a close bond could be interpreted as bristle knowing that he has to remain calm in battle or that he would sacrifice himself for sejuani
regardless of sejuanis skill if she were to be thrown off of her mount or if the flail were to be jerked then sejuani would be hurt in the process.
flails require steady rotation and are just as deadly to the wielder as it is to an opponent. in order for bristle to attack he'd have to shift his weight and thus would end up shifting the axis of the flail.
the boars back and neck are thicker forcing sejuani to learn forward to keep balance. her legs arent long enough to wrap to boars ribs like a rider on a horse can. her in game models appear to be gripping the boars neck hair to prevent falling off.


bristle does get to ram the opponents quite often though. sejuani immediately quits rotating her flail during the charge.

Hey, I will abuse this power as much as I can before she becomes unplayable.

Sad too because there is nothing wrong with current Sejuani.

Passive get procs by minions thou.... I don't understadn why.
{{champion:86}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:157}} neither gets proc (some get proc only by cannon minion) why sejuani can't receive the same treatment.

As of one of the PBE updates, only enemy champions can break Frost Armor.

As far as I can tell, that means she basically takes negligible damage in her jungle clears due to having over 100 armor at level 1.

Also, Bristle is the one actually taking enemy attacks rather than Sejuani. The tooltip for her new passive says that Bristle's the one with the frost armor, so it's not like he's not contributing anything besides Q.
Large monsters also proc it

They probably should make it work like {{champion:86}} then. Where only after level 13, epic monster no longer proc the passive to kinda balancing it out.

If what you say is true and only champion can proc it then she will be a hell of a top laner know more than a jungler.
What? There is stuff wrong with Sejuanj.

It's all a numbers game.  I like some things (passive resists and slow immunity is cool, I like her new W) and hate others (E is clunky and doesn't add any fun factor except it's overtuned damage, new Ult is meh).  She will be good while her damage is too high, then when she gets nerfed she will be left useless and not my Old Sejuani.  At least I'm getting too old to play this game.

Bristle is indeed male 

i remember a flavour text where they described the two and said her and him
The boar attacks always bugged me actually. She's the only champion in the game with a flail so it was disappointing that all she did with it was twirl it above her head.

thats debatable tbh

her flail spun during her second part of her w but she also slamed it during the first part of her w

she also used it for her ult 

there isnt much you can do with a flail, you spin it like thats its whole point

Not as bad as Quinn I guess. At least Sejuani used her weapon for her W and R. 
Quinn doesn't use her cross-bow for any of her abilities.
I overlooked this as well :C Maybe Sejuani first basic attack after Q is Bristle and also auto attacks against frozen enemies is Bristle?

It's the gameplay changes to Sejuani that make me sad.  I don't know what the final form will be but just at face value, I'm not sure if I will have a reason to pick Sejuani anymore (and she was already one of the lowest popularity champions).  I think the changes actually go against RIOT's design philosophy about maintaining what makes a champion unique as well - not that RIOT's use of design philosophy makes sense all that often.

She called the last one Bristle, and she'll call this one Bristle too until it no longer suits her purposes.

Such is the Circle of Life.
